name: Balloon Burst (vSebastian6)
description: Do you want to spend your time in a nice way? Then Balloon Burst is the perfect game for you. As it's name implies, the game is represented by balloon bursting. Sounds simple isn't it? But if the wind is blowing and you can click on balloons that will make you lose a life it doesn't seems that easy anymore. Call your friends and see who can burst more balloons in various levels of the game.
